author: matz-e
body: This is a forward port of the `HcalTriggerPrimitiveAlgo` changes of #6614. Relies on #12438 and topic `akhukhun:HF1x1LUTs80X` to be merged. Changes to the `Geometry/HcalTowerAlgo` were ported, too, to support producing 1x1 TP and 2x3 TP at the same time.
title: HF 1x1 TP production along 2x3 TP
